_comment: Jotform API configuration for both Python and PowerShell processors

webFetch._comment: Settings for browser-based JotForm data fetching (checking system)
webFetch.comment: Adaptive batch sizing: starts at 100, reduces on errors (504/truncation), increases after 2 consecutive successes

powershell.comment: Optimized for 87-field balanced chunks, tested stable at ~51s per upsert. maxConcurrentPdfs=2 processes multiple PDFs in parallel. maxConcurrentChunks=1 (sequential) required - Jotform API rejects concurrent UPDATEs to same submission

logging._comment: Log level configuration - set each level to true (log) or false (skip)
logging._REJECT_comment: Validation failures: sessionkey mismatch, core ID mismatch, school ID mismatch, filename format errors
logging._DATA_OVERWRITE_DIFF_comment: Data overwrite conflicts: fields that would change existing non-empty values (excludes exception fields like student-id, child-name, etc.)
logging._UPLOAD_comment: Jotform operations: created/updated submissions with field counts and chunk info
logging._FILED_comment: Successfully archived files with destination folder
logging._CLEANUP_comment: Maintenance operations: orphaned JSON cleanup, housekeeping tasks
logging._RENAME_comment: Filename normalization: shows original â†’ canonical name transformation
logging._WARN_comment: Non-critical issues: missing mappings, upload failures routed to Unsorted, file stability timeouts
logging._ERROR_comment: Critical failures: parser errors, processing exceptions, permanent Jotform failures
logging._INFO_comment: Verbose details: queued, moved to staging, parsing started/succeeded, validating, enriching, searching Jotform, scanning pages, filtering fields, chunking, processed, etc.
